sections.heading: Homestead; exemption; new owner of property; when claimed
sections.text: Any purchaser, new resident, or new owner of property must claim a homestead exemption as provided in section 77-3512 before the allowance to the owner on such property shall be lawful.SourceLaws 1979, LB 65, ยง 15;Laws 1983, LB 195, ยง 8.
